## Practice Question
Which of the OLS assumptions are necessary for the OLS estimate $\widehat{\beta}_1$ to be unbiased estimates of the population parameter $\beta_1$?

a. SLR1
b. SLR2
c. SLR3
d. SLR4

<div id="spoiler" style="display:none">

All of the above. OLS is unbiased only if all of the assumptions hold.
